com.device.service.rest.client

Interface IServiceUserAuthenticationClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServiceUserAuthenticationClientImpl

    public interface IServiceUserAuthenticationClient
    The interface allows to get the User authenticated against the Service
    Author:
    raunak

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean serviceUserAuthentication(java.lang.String serviceUserAuthenticationURL, UserSession userLoginServiceSession, AppSession appSession)
      This method does Service Authentication of the User.

    • Method Detail

      • serviceUserAuthentication

        boolean serviceUserAuthentication(java.lang.String serviceUserAuthenticationURL,
                                UserSession userLoginServiceSession,
                                AppSession appSession)
                                  throws java.io.IOException,
                                         RestClientException,
                                         InvalidResponseAuthenticatorException,
                                         ApplicationDetailServiceUninitializedException
        This method does Service Authentication of the User. This method requires App's Kerberos Authentication and User Login Service Authentication to be performed
        Parameters:
        serviceUserAuthenticationURL - String Web service URL to be called for User Service Authentication
        userLoginServiceSession - UserSession User Login Service Session created by the LoginServer
        appSession - AppSession App Session for the service for which the user is being authenticated
        Returns:
        boolean true if successfully authenticated else false
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case there are some errors encountered while retrieving information
        RestClientException - If the status of the response is not 200. The server side error message and error response code can be accessed using getMessage and getErrorCode methods respectively
        InvalidResponseAuthenticatorException - If the Response Authenticator is not valid
        ApplicationDetailServiceUninitializedException - If the ApplicationDetailService has not been initialized properly
